(cont'd)

"... Why does one keep mulling over Einstein's sayings?  One enters the 'debate' with dismay. The acceptance of the Lorentz Transform as mathematically valid, and the quality of existing objections, signal an incompetence beyond belief. The requisite 'algebra', intuitively tackled by every infant, is summarized in sufficient detail at the start of every maths textbook for engineers; people who have not mastered this elementary stage of common sense cognition should not be doing physics."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Einstein's Illogicality and Lack of Critical Faculty - Part 2
